name: CLONER (WarFare Creations)
description:
Think Big.......Make Big........Make many.

Generate your clones and solve the puzzles.

Note : There can be more than one ways of solving a Puzzle.

Controls :

  • "A" and "D" for moving left and right.
  • Right Click for Shoot.
  • "F" for Cloning.
  • "SPACE" for Jump.

Best part :

  1. Eye catching visuals.
  2. Easy controls.
  3. Perfect paced.
  4. Great UI.
  5. Understandable Tutorial.
